source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Cinema 4D - Learn Advanced Mograph Techniques
items.headline: Learn how to use Mograph and Fields together to create flexible, powerful and procedural designs.
objectives_summary: Advanced Mograph techniques and procedural systems
Learn how to use Mograph and Fields together to create flexible and powerful designs.
Learn how to integrate the procedural systems with 3D-models.

items.title: Get Amazing 3d Renders in Keyshot 9

visible_instructors.name: Mansoor
visible_instructors.job_title: I am VFX Artist & Passionate About Teaching
visible_instructors.title: Mansoor Bilal

items.headline: Become a 3d Rending Export in Keyshot 9
objectives_summary: How to import 3d objects
How to import 3d animation in Keyshot 9
How to Use Library

items.title: Blender 2.8 - Hard Surface Character Creation
items.headline: Learn how to create hard surface characters with Blender 2.8x
objectives_summary: Hard Surface Modeling
Creating Realistic Materials
Creating Light Setups

items.title: 3D Character Walk Cycle Animation with Maya for Beginners
items.headline: An effective 3d walk cycle animation sequence for beginners (using The Bean Sprout F3R3 Method)
objectives_summary: Learn To Install And Animate With Norman Rig in Maya
Animate a Walk Cycle Animation With a 3D Character With Proper Sequence
Learn to Apply 6/12 Principles of Animation: Pose to Pose, Timing, Easing In and Out, Overlapping Action, Exaggeration, Appeal

items.title: Character Rigging for Beginners - Advanced Hand Rigging
items.headline: Take your 3D Rigging skills to the next level in 2020 by creating a sophisticated Hand Rig from start to finish.
objectives_summary: Build the actual hand bones and then refine their placement for more realitic articulation.
Add secondary bones that will help in preserving volume when bending the fingers.
Build a knuckle system to preserve the nice shape of our hand knuckles.

items.title: Animating in Unity
items.headline: Learn how to use Cinemachine, Animation Rigging, Unity Timeline and the Animator window to create animations in Unity
objectives_summary: Master animation techniques using Unity timeline
Take control of cameras using Cinemachine
Become confident with Animation rigging

items.title: Blender: Create and rig realistic Batmobile from A to Z
items.headline: in this course we will learn step by step who to create and rig realistic modern Batmobile vehicle from start to finish
objectives_summary: how to setup the scene to start the modeling journey
how to use extruding surface technique to build the whole body of the vehicle
how to make the final result of the mesh super clean and make the reflection flows smoothly on the surface.

items.title: Create Video Game Tileable Textures From Scratch

visible_instructors.title: Alex Zaragoza
visible_instructors.job_title: 3D Artist / Best Seller Instructor / Cast N Play Co-Founder
visible_instructors.name: Alex

items.headline: Learn the tools and techniques to create amazing textures
objectives_summary: Create tileable textures that can be used in Animation and Video Games.

items.title: Advanced CGI / VFX Compositing
items.headline: Mini Master Class in Visual Effects Compositing
objectives_summary: You will gain a comprehensive understanding on how to create a CGI shot from start to finish.
You will learn the techniques and best practices for creating photorealistic CGI shots.
You will learn how to use powerful VFX software such as After Effects, Element 3D and Blender

items.title: Rigging a Character with Duik Bassel (Fast & Simple Method )
items.headline: Learn Duik Bassel to easily Rig your character and make walk cycle Animation | Masterclass of Rigging & Animation
objectives_summary: How to rig a character in After Effects
how to create a walking animation automatically using duik bassel 2020
how to create a walking animation manually

items.title: Learning Zbrush from Scratch
items.headline: Zbrush is the all in one solution for your 3D modeling needs.
objectives_summary: Importing into Zbrush
Working with Primitives
Subdivision Levels

items.title: SolidWorks 2019 Beginner to Advanced (All Commands Included)
items.headline: Master SolidWorks from the Beginning to Professional
objectives_summary: All Commands in Solidworks
How to us sketch in Solidworks
How to create a part on SolidWorks

items.title: Learn to Model a Cartoon Car in Maya
items.headline: Build Your Own 3D Low Poly Game Asset - Step by Step
objectives_summary: Learn one of the top Modeling Software in both Game and Film industry.
Model a low poly mobile game friendly art assets.
Unwrap and setup uvs and textures for complex shapes.

items.title: After Effects : Learn Kinetic Typography and Freelancing
items.headline: Kinetic Typography made easy
objectives_summary: Solid understanding of the software Adobe After Effects
Working with texts and videos
Getting aware of freelancing world with kinetic typograhy

items.title: Low Poly modeling and animation in Cinema 4D
items.headline: Cinema 4D course of animation and low poly style basics
objectives_summary: 2 hours tutorial with the great result at the end of the course
I will teach you a process for generating professional 3d graphics quickly and effectively in Cinema 4D
You will learn to model, texture, light, and render a 3d scene from beginning to end

items.title: Jewellery Design in Rhino: Intermediate level

visible_instructors.name: Hamed
visible_instructors.job_title: Jewellery CAD Designer, Jeweller and Instructor
visible_instructors.title: Hamed Arab

items.headline: Intermediate and advance Jewellery Designing Techniques in Rhino 3D
objectives_summary: Get to know fundamental and advance Jewelry techniques for designing  jewelry with computer and CAD software
Increase ability to work as a Jewelry CAD designer or  Jewellry CAD Technician in jewelry companies or be self-employed
Design CAD models within the metrics of scale, proportion and element relationships
